name: partition
description: Partitions the given array to the ones that pass the given predicate function and the ones that do not. By [convention of the Haskell's Data.Either](http://hackage.haskell.org/package/base-4.12.0.0/docs/Data-Either.html), values that pass the predicate are placed at the right.
questions: How to partition an array based on a condition?
How to divide an array by a filter function?
